title: Game constantly disconnecting
body: I havent played in a while, but I decided to jump back in, updated my game, and went into an aram, it lagged out really hard, then disconnected me 4 or 5 times, but finally balanced out, no biggie, stuff happens, tried another, same thing, then another, same thing except it never balanced out, and the one I am currently in, I cannot even play it, so I closed my game ran the repair, and no improvement, they are still losing an aram 4v5 right now because of this

replies.body: Seems to be resolved, was happening in East Texas with Suddenlink internet for a bit

Oh man, that sucks that you're randomly getting these issues in the middle of a game. Let's see if we can get that evened out before hopping back into pvp matches. 

When the game tries to reconnect, it might be due to your connection not being configured in the best way to reach out servers. Let's double check you [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quick, test it in a custom/practice game, and let me know how it helps.

I installed the tool kit for the repairs and stuff, is there a specific log you would like for me to upload?...edit, I just did a custom with no lag, may have been an isp issue or something, its happened with a different provider before, I will try an ARAM, and update you guys
